General.Name: Ledman Optoelectronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Ledman Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. provides LED stadium display products and solutions in the People's Republic of China. The company offers COB LED displays, indoor and outdoor fixed LED displays. It also provides rental LED displays and LED components. The company also exports its products to the United States, Japan, Germany, and other countries. Ledman Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
